scripts.docker:prod:rebuild: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml up --build
scripts.docker:prod:rebuild:bg: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:dev:rebuild: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.db-dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.db-dev.yml up --build
scripts.docker:dev:rebuild:bg: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.db-dev.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.db-dev.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:db:rebuild: docker-compose -f docker-compose.db.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.db.yml up --build
scripts.docker:db:rebuild:bg: docker-compose -f docker-compose.db.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.db.yml up -d --build
scripts.docker:exec:prod:api: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml exec api sh
scripts.docker:exec:prod:web: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml exec web sh
scripts.docker:exec:prod:db: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml exec db mysql -u root -p
scripts.docker:exec:dev:api: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml exec api sh
scripts.docker:exec:dev:web: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml exec web sh
scripts.docker:exec:dev:db: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml exec db mysql -u root -p
scripts.docker:clean:prod: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.docker:clean:dev: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.docker:clean:all: docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.db.yml down -v && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml -f docker-compose.db-dev.yml down -v && docker system prune -af
